location.region: Distributed across all mountains in the Central Plains (Jungwon).
location.base_type: Mountain Strongholds (Sanchae) located at strategic choke points.
location.connectivity: Loose network due to vast distances; poor communication compared to major sects.

structure.composition: Mostly starving peasants turned bandits, led by physically gifted criminals.

survival_strategy: Bullies to the weak, cowards to the strong (Gang-yak-yak-gang).
Avoid conflicts with major sects; retreat is recommended if the enemy is strong.

quality_of_force.leaders: Approximately First Rate (Ilryu). Rely on innate physical strength (Talent) rather than refined technique.

narrative_role: The 'Starter Villain' for the protagonist to farm experience and loot.
A barometer for the world's economic state (more bandits = worse economy).

internal_rules: Free speech in private, absolute obedience in public.
external_rules: Extort 'appropriate' tolls (don't kill the golden goose).
Build 'friendly' relations with neighbors (for easier extortion).
Do not intervene in other sects' wars.
laws_and_customs.summary: Rules exist to mimic a formal sect, but essentially boil down to 'Don't get killed' and 'Steal wisely'.

martial_arts_library.meta_note: Names sound grandiose, but often lack substance. Most are rough techniques relying on brute force.
martial_arts_library.signature_weapon: Axe (Bu / 斧) and Dao (Saber / 刀).

nokrim_32_arts.description: A mix of stolen or crudely created arts distributed by the Headquarter.
selected_list: 천정록화비공 (Heaven Well Green Flower Secret Art)
